OtherTaxCarryforwardGrossAmount.description: The amount of the tax credit carryforward, before tax effects, available to reduce future taxable income under enacted tax laws.

OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentCreditLosses.label: Other than Temporary Impairment, Credit Losses Recognized in Earnings, Additions, Additional Credit Losses
OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentCreditLosses.description: This item represents an increase to the cumulative amount of credit losses recognized in earnings for an other than temporary impairment (OTTI) of a debt security held for which a previous OTTI was recognized and the investor does not intend to sell the debt security and it is not more likely than not that the investor will be required to sell the debt security before recovery of its amortized cost basis.

OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentCreditLosses.label: Other than Temporary Impairment, Credit Losses Recognized in Earnings, Additions, No Previous Impairment
OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentCreditLosses.description: This item represents an increase to the cumulative amount of credit losses recognized in earnings for an other than temporary impairment (OTTI) of a debt security held for which no such other than temporary impairment (OTTI) was previously recognized.

OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentCreditLosses.label: Other than Temporary Impairment, Credit Losses Recognized in Earnings, Credit Losses on Debt Securities Held
OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentCreditLosses.description: The cumulative amount of credit losses recognized in earnings related to debt securities held for which a portion of an other than temporary impairment (OTTI) was recognized in other comprehensive income (a component of shareholders' equity).

OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentCreditLosses.label: Other than Temporary Impairment, Credit Losses Recognized in Earnings, Reductions, Securities Sold
OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentCreditLosses.description: This item represents reductions in the cumulative amount of credit losses recognized in earnings for an other than temporary impairment (OTTI) of a debt security because of the sale of impaired securities during the period.

OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentLossDebtSecu.label: Other-than-temporary Impairment Loss, Debt Securities, Available-for-sale, Recognized in Earnings
OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentLossDebtSecu.description: Amount of other-than-temporary impairment (OTTI) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), recognized in earnings.

OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentLossDebtSecu.label: Other-than-temporary Impairment Loss, Debt Securities, Portion Recognized in Earnings
OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentLossDebtSecu.description: Amount of other-than-temporary impairment (OTTI) on investment in debt security, recognized in earnings.

OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentLossesInvest.label: Other than Temporary Impairment Losses, Investments, Portion in Other Comprehensive Loss, before Tax, Including Portion Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentLossesInvest.description: Amount before tax of other than temporary impairment (OTTI) loss on investments in available-for-sale and held-to-maturity debt securities, recognized in other comprehensive loss.

OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentLossesInvest.label: Other-than-temporary Impairment Loss, Debt Securities, Available-for-sale, Portion in Other Comprehensive Loss, before Tax, Including Portion Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentLossesInvest.description: Amount, before tax, of other-than-temporary impairment (OTTI) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), recognized in other comprehensive income (OCI).

OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentLossesInvest.label: Other than Temporary Impairment Losses, Investments, Portion in Other Comprehensive Loss, Net of Tax, Including Portion Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentLossesInvest.description: Amount after tax of other than temporary impairment (OTTI) loss on investments in available-for-sale and held-to-maturity debt securities, recognized in other comprehensive loss.

OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentLossesInvest.label: Other than Temporary Impairment Losses, Investments, Portion Recognized in Earnings, Net
OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentLossesInvest.description: The amount of other than temporary impairment (OTTI) losses on equity securities, OTTI related to credit losses on debt securities, and OTTI losses on debt securities when the entity intends to sell the securities or it is more likely than not that the entity will be required to sell the securities before recovery of its amortized cost basis. Additionally, this item includes OTTI losses recognized during the period on investments accounted for under the cost method of accounting.

OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentLossesInvest.label: Other than Temporary Impairment Losses, Investments, Portion Recognized in Earnings, Net, Available-for-sale Securities
OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentLossesInvest.description: The amount of other than temporary impairment losses on investments in debt and equity securities categorized as Available-for-sale which have been recognized in earnings during the period. Such impairment losses consist of other than temporary impairments (OTTI) on equity securities, credit losses on investments in debt securities, and when the entity intends to sell an impaired debt security or it is more likely than not that the entity will be required to sell the impaired debt security before recovery of its amortized cost basis.

ParticipatingPoliciesAsPercentageOfGross.label: Participating Insurance, Percentage of Gross Insurance in Force
ParticipatingPoliciesAsPercentageOfGross.description: Percentage of participating insurance contract to insurance contracts in force.

PaymentsForLossesAndLossAdjustmentExpens.label: Liability for Unpaid Claims and Claims Adjustment Expense, Claims Paid
PaymentsForLossesAndLossAdjustmentExpens.description: Amount, after effects of reinsurance, of payments to settle insured claims and pay costs incurred in the claims settlement process.

PaymentsForProceedsFromOtherInvestingAct.label: Payments for (Proceeds from) Other Investing Activities
PaymentsForProceedsFromOtherInvestingAct.description: Amount of cash (inflow) outflow from investing activities classified as other.

PaymentsForProceedsFromPolicyLoans.label: Payments for (Proceeds from) Policy Loans
PaymentsForProceedsFromPolicyLoans.description: Net amount paid or received by the entity associated with issuance or collection of loans made to policy holders, principally secured by the benefits under the policy.

PaymentsForRepurchaseOfCommonStock.label: Payments for Repurchase of Common Stock
PaymentsForRepurchaseOfCommonStock.description: The cash outflow to reacquire common stock during the period.

PaymentsOfDebtExtinguishmentCosts.label: Payment for Debt Extinguishment or Debt Prepayment Cost
PaymentsOfDebtExtinguishmentCosts.description: Amount of cash outflow for cost from early extinguishment and prepayment of debt. Includes, but is not limited to, third-party cost, premium paid, and other fee paid to lender directly for debt extinguishment or debt prepayment. Excludes accrued interest.

PaymentsOfDividends.label: Payments of Dividends
PaymentsOfDividends.description: Cash outflow in the form of capital distributions and dividends to common shareholders, preferred shareholders and noncontrolling interests.

PaymentsToAcquireAvailableForSaleSecurit.label: Payments to Acquire Available-for-sale Securities
PaymentsToAcquireAvailableForSaleSecurit.description: The cash outflow to acquire debt and equity securities not classified as either held-to-maturity securities or trading securities which would be classified as available-for-sale securities and reported at fair value, with unrealized gains and losses excluded from earnings and reported in a separate component of shareholders' equity.

PaymentsToAcquireBusinessesNetOfCashAcqu.label: Payments to Acquire Businesses, Net of Cash Acquired
PaymentsToAcquireBusinessesNetOfCashAcqu.description: The cash outflow associated with the acquisition of a business, net of the cash acquired from the purchase.

PaymentsToAcquireInvestments.label: Payments to Acquire Investments
PaymentsToAcquireInvestments.description: The cash outflow associated with the purchase of all investments (debt, security, other) during the period.

PaymentsToAcquireOtherInvestments.label: Payments to Acquire Other Investments
PaymentsToAcquireOtherInvestments.description: Amount of cash outflow to acquire investments classified as other.

PensionContributions.label: Payment for Pension Benefits
PensionContributions.description: Amount of cash outflow for pension benefit. Includes, but is not limited to, employer contribution to fund plan asset and payment to retiree. Excludes other postretirement benefit.

PolicyholderBenefitsAndClaimsIncurredGro.label: Policyholder Benefits and Claims Incurred, Direct
PolicyholderBenefitsAndClaimsIncurredGro.description: Amount, before effect of policies assumed or ceded, of expense related to provision for policy benefits and costs incurred.

PolicyholderBenefitsAndClaimsIncurredNet.label: Policyholder Benefits and Claims Incurred, Net
PolicyholderBenefitsAndClaimsIncurredNet.description: Amount, after effects of policies assumed or ceded, of expense related to the provision for policy benefits and costs incurred.

PolicyholderContractDeposits.label: Policyholder Contract Deposit
PolicyholderContractDeposits.description: Amount of liability due to policyholder for deposit held under long-duration contract issued by insurance entity.

PolicyholderDividends.label: Policyholder Dividends, Expense
PolicyholderDividends.description: Amount of expense for dividends to policyholders.

PolicyholderDividendsPayable.label: Policyholder Dividends Payable
PolicyholderDividendsPayable.description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of the liability for dividends that are payable to the policyholders based upon the terms of the underlying insurance contracts.

PolicyholderFunds.label: Policyholder Account Balance
PolicyholderFunds.description: Amount due to policyholder. Includes, but is not limited to, unpaid policy dividend, retrospective refund, and undistributed earnings on participating business. Excludes future policy benefit and claim expense.

PreferredStockSharesAuthorized.label: Preferred Stock, Shares Authorized
PreferredStockSharesAuthorized.description: The maximum number of nonredeemable preferred shares (or preferred stock redeemable solely at the option of the issuer) permitted to be issued by an entity's charter and bylaws.

PreferredStockSharesIssued.label: Preferred Stock, Shares Issued
PreferredStockSharesIssued.description: Total number of nonredeemable preferred shares (or preferred stock redeemable solely at the option of the issuer) issued to shareholders (includes related preferred shares that were issued, repurchased, and remain in the treasury). May be all or portion of the number of preferred shares authorized. Excludes preferred shares that are classified as debt.

PreferredStockSharesOutstanding.label: Preferred Stock, Shares Outstanding
PreferredStockSharesOutstanding.description: Aggregate share number for all nonredeemable preferred stock (or preferred stock redeemable solely at the option of the issuer) held by stockholders. Does not include preferred shares that have been repurchased.

PreferredStockValueOutstanding.label: Preferred Stock, Value, Outstanding
PreferredStockValueOutstanding.description: Value of all nonredeemable preferred stock (or preferred stock redeemable solely at the option of the issuer) held by shareholders, which is net of related treasury stock. May be all or a portion of the number of preferred shares authorized. These shares represent the ownership interest of the preferred shareholders.

PremiumsAndOtherReceivablesNet.label: Premiums and Other Receivables, Net
PremiumsAndOtherReceivablesNet.description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date, net of allowance for doubtful accounts, of all premiums and other types of receivables due from other persons or entities.

PremiumsEarnedNet.label: Premiums Earned, Net
PremiumsEarnedNet.description: Amount, after premiums ceded to other entities and premiums assumed by the entity, of premiums earned.

PremiumsWrittenNet.label: Premiums Written, Net
PremiumsWrittenNet.description: Amount, after premiums ceded to other entities and premiums assumed by the entity, of premiums written.

PresentValueOfFutureInsuranceProfits.label: Present Value of Future Insurance Profits (Deprecated 2014-01-31)
PresentValueOfFutureInsuranceProfits.description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of the present value of the future profits asset (also known as value of business acquired).

PresentValueOfFutureInsuranceProfitsAddi.label: Present Value of Future Insurance Profits, Addition from Acquisition
PresentValueOfFutureInsuranceProfitsAddi.description: Amount of addition for present value of future profits of insurance contract acquired in business combination.

PresentValueOfFutureInsuranceProfitsAmor.label: Present Value of Future Insurance Profits, Amortization Expense, Accrued Interest
PresentValueOfFutureInsuranceProfitsAmor.description: Amount of amortization expense for present value of future profits of insurance contract acquired in business combination from accrued interest on unamortized balance.

PresentValueOfFutureInsuranceProfitsAmor.label: Present Value of Future Insurance Profits, Expected Amortization, Year Five
PresentValueOfFutureInsuranceProfitsAmor.description: Amount of amortization for present value of future profits of insurance contract acquired in business combination expected to be recognized during fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

PresentValueOfFutureInsuranceProfitsAmor.label: Present Value of Future Insurance Profits, Expected Amortization, Year Four
PresentValueOfFutureInsuranceProfitsAmor.description: Amount of amortization for present value of future profits of insurance contract acquired in business combination expected to be recognized during fourth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

PresentValueOfFutureInsuranceProfitsAmor.label: Present Value of Future Insurance Profits, Expected Amortization, Year One
PresentValueOfFutureInsuranceProfitsAmor.description: Amount of amortization for present value of future profits of insurance contract acquired in business combination expected to be recognized during next fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

PresentValueOfFutureInsuranceProfitsAmor.label: Present Value of Future Insurance Profits, Expected Amortization, Year Three
PresentValueOfFutureInsuranceProfitsAmor.description: Amount of amortization for present value of future profits of insurance contract acquired in business combination expected to be recognized during third fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

PresentValueOfFutureInsuranceProfitsAmor.label: Present Value of Future Insurance Profits, Expected Amortization, Year Two
PresentValueOfFutureInsuranceProfitsAmor.description: Amount of amortization for present value of future profits of insurance contract acquired in business combination expected to be recognized during second fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

PresentValueOfFutureInsuranceProfitsInte.label: Present Value of Future Insurance Profits, Interest Accrued (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
PresentValueOfFutureInsuranceProfitsInte.description: Amount of long-term market rate of interest earned on present value of future insurance profits during the reporting period.

PresentValueOfFutureInsuranceProfitsInte.label: Present Value of Future Insurance Profits, Interest Accrued (Deprecated 2017-01-31)
PresentValueOfFutureInsuranceProfitsInte.description: Amount of interest earned on present value of future insurance profits.

ProceedsFromDivestitureOfBusinesses.label: Proceeds from Divestiture of Businesses
ProceedsFromDivestitureOfBusinesses.description: The cash inflow associated with the amount received from the sale of a portion of the company's business, for example a segment, division, branch or other business, during the period.

ProceedsFromDivestitureOfBusinessesNetOf.label: Proceeds from Divestiture of Businesses, Net of Cash Divested
ProceedsFromDivestitureOfBusinessesNetOf.description: This element represents the cash inflow during the period from the sale of a component of the entity.

ProceedsFromDivestitureOfInterestInSubsi.label: Proceeds from Divestiture of Interest in Subsidiaries and Affiliates
ProceedsFromDivestitureOfInterestInSubsi.description: The cash inflow associated with the deconsolidation of a previously consolidated subsidiary or sale of an entity that is related to it but not strictly controlled.

ProceedsFromIssuanceOfCommonStock.label: Proceeds from Issuance of Common Stock
ProceedsFromIssuanceOfCommonStock.description: The cash inflow from the additional capital contribution to the entity.

ProceedsFromIssuanceOfLongTermDebt.label: Proceeds from Issuance of Long-term Debt
ProceedsFromIssuanceOfLongTermDebt.description: The cash inflow from a debt initially having maturity due after one year or beyond the operating cycle, if longer.

ProceedsFromIssuanceOfPreferredStockAndP.label: Proceeds from Issuance of Preferred Stock and Preference Stock
ProceedsFromIssuanceOfPreferredStockAndP.description: Proceeds from issuance of capital stock which provides for a specific dividend that is paid to the shareholders before any dividends to common stockholders and which takes precedence over common stockholders in the event of liquidation.

ProceedsFromMaturitiesPrepaymentsAndCall.label: Proceeds from Maturities, Prepayments and Calls of Debt Securities, Available-for-sale
ProceedsFromMaturitiesPrepaymentsAndCall.description: Amount of cash inflow from maturity, prepayment and call of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

ProceedsFromPaymentsForOtherFinancingAct.label: Proceeds from (Payments for) Other Financing Activities
ProceedsFromPaymentsForOtherFinancingAct.description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from financing activities classified as other.

ProceedsFromPaymentsForTradingSecurities.label: Proceeds from (Payments for) Trading Securities, Short-term
ProceedsFromPaymentsForTradingSecurities.description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from sales and purchases of trading securities.

ProceedsFromSaleAndMaturityOfOtherInvest.label: Proceeds from Sale and Maturity of Other Investments
ProceedsFromSaleAndMaturityOfOtherInvest.description: The cash inflow associated with the sale and maturity (principal being due) of other investments, prepayment and call (request of early payment) of other investments not otherwise defined in the taxonomy.

ProceedsFromSaleMaturityAndCollectionsOf.label: Proceeds from Sale, Maturity and Collection of Investments
ProceedsFromSaleMaturityAndCollectionsOf.description: The cash inflow associated with the sale, maturity and collection of all investments such as debt, security and so forth during the period.

ProceedsFromSaleOfAvailableForSaleSecuri.label: Proceeds from Sale of Available-for-sale Securities
ProceedsFromSaleOfAvailableForSaleSecuri.description: The cash inflow associated with the sale of debt and equity securities classified as available-for-sale securities.

ProvisionForLoanLossesExpensed.label: Financing Receivable, Credit Loss, Expense (Reversal)
ProvisionForLoanLossesExpensed.description: Amount of credit loss expense (reversal of expense) for financing receivable.

RealEstateInvestments.label: Real Estate Investments, Net
RealEstateInvestments.description: Amount of real estate investments, net of accumulated depreciation, which may include the following: (1) land available-for-sale; (2) land available-for-development; (3) investments in building and building improvements; (4) tenant allowances; (5) developments in-process; (6) rental properties; (7) other real estate investments; (8) real estate joint ventures; and (9) unconsolidated real estate and other joint ventures not separately presented.

ReinsuranceCostsAndRecoveriesNet.label: Policyholder Benefits and Claims Incurred, Assumed and Ceded
ReinsuranceCostsAndRecoveriesNet.description: Amount of recovery (expense) related to provision for policy benefits and costs incurred for policies assumed and ceded.

ReinsurancePremiumsForInsuranceCompanies.label: Reinsurance Premiums for Insurance Companies, by Product Segment, Amount Assumed from Other Companies (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
ReinsurancePremiumsForInsuranceCompanies.description: Amount of premiums assumed from other companies.

ReinsurancePremiumsForInsuranceCompanies.label: Reinsurance Premiums for Insurance Companies, by Product Segment, Amount Ceded to Other Companies (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
ReinsurancePremiumsForInsuranceCompanies.description: Amount of premiums ceded to other companies.

ReinsurancePremiumsForInsuranceCompanies.label: Reinsurance Premiums for Insurance Companies, by Product Segment, Gross Amount (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
Reinsurance Premiums for Insurance Companies, by Product Segment, Net Amount (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
ReinsurancePremiumsForInsuranceCompanies.description: Net amount of gross premiums, less premiums ceded to other companies, plus premiums assumed from other companies; which represents the net amount of premium revenue on the income statement.

ReinsuranceReceivablesCaseBasis.label: Reinsurance Recoverables, Case Basis
ReinsuranceReceivablesCaseBasis.description: The sum for all reinsurance arrangements of the known and estimated amount recoverable as of the balance sheet date from a given reinsurer for claims paid or incurred by the ceding insurer and associated claims settlement expenses for each reinsurance arrangement (or, the sum of all cases determined individually, probably applying different assumptions to each arrangement).

ReinsuranceRecoverableCreditLossExpenseR.label: Reinsurance Recoverable, Credit Loss Expense (Reversal)
ReinsuranceRecoverableCreditLossExpenseR.description: Amount of expense (reversal of expense) for expected credit loss on reinsurance recoverable.

ReinsuranceRecoverableForUnpaidClaimsAnd.label: Reinsurance Recoverable for Unpaid Claims and Claims Adjustments
ReinsuranceRecoverableForUnpaidClaimsAnd.description: Amount, after valuation allowance, recoverable under reinsurance contracts for losses reported to the ceding insurer but not yet paid and amounts expected for incurred losses and settlement expenses, which have not yet been reported to the ceding insurer.

ReinsuranceRecoverables.label: Reinsurance Recoverables, Including Reinsurance Premium Paid
ReinsuranceRecoverables.description: Amount, after valuation allowance, recoverable under reinsurance contracts including premium paid under reinsurance contracts. Examples include, but are not limited to, settled and unsettled claims, incurred but not reported losses, loss adjustment expense, premium paid, policy benefits and policy reserves.

ReinsuranceRecoverablesAllowance.label: Reinsurance Recoverable, Allowance for Credit Loss
ReinsuranceRecoverablesAllowance.description: Amount of allowance for credit loss on reinsurance recoverable.

RepaymentsOfLongTermDebt.label: Repayments of Long-term Debt
RepaymentsOfLongTermDebt.description: The cash outflow for debt initially having maturity due after one year or beyond the normal operating cycle, if longer.

RestructuringCharges.label: Restructuring Charges
RestructuringCharges.description: Amount of expenses associated with exit or disposal activities pursuant to an authorized plan. Excludes expenses related to a discontinued operation or an asset retirement obligation.

RetainedEarningsAccumulatedDeficit.label: Retained Earnings (Accumulated Deficit)
RetainedEarningsAccumulatedDeficit.description: The cumulative amount of the reporting entity's undistributed earnings or deficit.

RevenueFromContractWithCustomerExcluding.label: Revenue from Contract with Customer, Excluding Assessed Tax
RevenueFromContractWithCustomerExcluding.description: Amount, excluding tax collected from customer, of revenue from satisfaction of performance obligation by transferring promised good or service to customer. Tax collected from customer is tax assessed by governmental authority that is both imposed on and concurrent with specific revenue-producing transaction, including, but not limited to, sales, use, value added and excise.

Revenues.label: Revenues
Revenues.description: Amount of revenue recognized from goods sold, services rendered, insurance premiums, or other activities that constitute an earning process. Includes, but is not limited to, investment and interest income before deduction of interest expense when recognized as a component of revenue, and sales and trading gain (loss).

RightOfUseAssetObtainedInExchangeForOper.label: Right-of-Use Asset Obtained in Exchange for Operating Lease Liability
RightOfUseAssetObtainedInExchangeForOper.description: Amount of increase in right-of-use asset obtained in exchange for operating lease liability.

SaleLeasebackTransactionAccumulatedDepre.label: Sale Leaseback Transaction, Accumulated Depreciation
SaleLeasebackTransactionAccumulatedDepre.description: The accumulated depreciation and amortization related to the asset(s) sold in connection with the property sold to another party and leased back to the seller.

SaleLeasebackTransactionGrossProceeds.label: Sale Leaseback Transaction, Gross Proceeds (Deprecated 2014-01-31)
SaleLeasebackTransactionGrossProceeds.description: The gross proceeds received from the asset(s) sold in connection with the transaction involving the sale of property to another party and the lease back to the seller.

SaleLeasebackTransactionGrossProceedsFin.label: Sale Leaseback Transaction, Gross Proceeds, Financing Activities
SaleLeasebackTransactionGrossProceedsFin.description: Amount of cash inflow before closing and debt issuance costs received by a seller-lessee in a sale-leaseback recognized in financing activities.

SaleLeasebackTransactionNetBookValue.label: Sale Leaseback Transaction, Net Book Value
SaleLeasebackTransactionNetBookValue.description: The net book value of the asset(s) sold in connection with the sale of the property to another party and lease back to the seller.

SecuredBorrowingsGrossIncludingNotSubjec.label: Secured Borrowings, Gross Including Not Subject to Master Netting Arrangement
SecuredBorrowingsGrossIncludingNotSubjec.description: Amount, before effects of master netting arrangements, of financial assets loaned to entities in exchange for collateral and funds outstanding borrowed in the form of a financial asset repurchase agreement between the entity and another party for the sale and repurchase of identical or substantially the same financial assets at a date certain for a specified price. Includes liabilities not subject to a master netting arrangement.

SecuritiesBorrowed.label: Securities Borrowed
SecuritiesBorrowed.description: Amount, after the effects of master netting arrangements, of securities borrowed from entities in exchange for collateral. Includes assets not subject to a master netting arrangement and not elected to be offset.

SecuritiesBorrowedAmountOffsetAgainstCol.label: Securities Borrowed, Amount Offset Against Collateral
SecuritiesBorrowedAmountOffsetAgainstCol.description: Amount, after effects of master netting arrangements, of securities borrowed from entities in exchange for collateral offset against an obligation to return collateral under a master netting arrangement. Includes assets not subject to a master netting arrangement and not elected to be offset.

SecuritiesBorrowedGross.label: Securities Borrowed, Gross
SecuritiesBorrowedGross.description: Amount, before effects of master netting arrangements, of securities borrowed from entities in exchange for collateral. Includes assets elected not to be offset. Excludes assets not subject to a master netting arrangement.

SecuritiesLoaned.label: Securities Loaned
SecuritiesLoaned.description: Amount, after the effects of master netting arrangements, of securities loaned to entities in exchange for collateral. Includes liabilities not subject to a master netting arrangement and not elected to be offset.

SecuritiesLoanedAmountOffsetAgainstColla.label: Securities Loaned, Amount Offset Against Collateral
SecuritiesLoanedAmountOffsetAgainstColla.description: Amount, after effects of master netting arrangements, of securities loaned to entities in exchange for collateral offset against a right to receive collateral. Includes liabilities not subject to a master netting arrangement and not elected to be offset.

SecuritiesLoanedGross.label: Securities Loaned, Gross
SecuritiesLoanedGross.description: Amount, before effects of master netting arrangements, of securities loaned to entities in exchange for collateral. Includes liabilities elected not to be offset. Excludes liabilities not subject to a master netting arrangement.

SecuritiesLoanedIncludingNotSubjectToMas.label: Securities Loaned, Including Not Subject to Master Netting Arrangement and Assets other than Securities Transferred
SecuritiesLoanedIncludingNotSubjectToMas.description: Amount, before effects of master netting arrangements, of financial assets loaned to entities in exchange for collateral. Includes liabilities not subject to a master netting arrangement and financial assets transferred other than securities that qualify as secured borrowings.

SecuritiesSoldUnderAgreementsToRepurchas.label: Securities Sold under Agreements to Repurchase
SecuritiesSoldUnderAgreementsToRepurchas.description: Amount, after the effects of master netting arrangements, of funds outstanding borrowed in the form of a security repurchase agreement between the entity and another party for the sale and repurchase of identical or substantially the same securities at a date certain for a specified price. Includes liabilities not subject to a master netting arrangement and not elected to be offset.

SeparateAccountAssets.label: Separate Account Asset
SeparateAccountAssets.description: Amount of asset at fair value held for benefit of separate account policyholder.

SeparateAccountsLiability.label: Separate Account, Liability
SeparateAccountsLiability.description: Amount of liability for variable contract in which all or portion of contract holder's funds is allocated to specific separate account and supported by assets held in separate account.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Shares Issued in Period
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Number of shares issued under share-based payment arrangement.

ShortTermDebtWeightedAverageInterestRate.label: Short-term Debt, Weighted Average Interest Rate, at Point in Time
ShortTermDebtWeightedAverageInterestRate.description: Weighted average interest rate of short-term debt outstanding calculated at point in time.

StatutoryAccountingPracticesStatutoryAmo.label: Statutory Accounting Practices, Statutory Amount Available for Dividend Payments
StatutoryAccountingPracticesStatutoryAmo.description: Amount of dividends available for payment after computation of statutory restrictions on capital surplus.

StatutoryAccountingPracticesStatutoryCap.label: Statutory Accounting Practices, Statutory Capital and Surplus, Balance
StatutoryAccountingPracticesStatutoryCap.description: The amount of statutory capital and surplus (stockholders' equity) as of the balance sheet date using prescribed or permitted statutory accounting practices (rather than GAAP, if different) of the state or country.

StatutoryAccountingPracticesStatutoryNet.label: Statutory Accounting Practices, Statutory Net Income Amount
StatutoryAccountingPracticesStatutoryNet.description: Amount of net income for the period determined using accounting principles prescribed or permitted by insurance regulators.

StockholdersEquity.label: Stockholders' Equity Attributable to Parent
StockholdersEquity.description: Total of all stockholders' equity (deficit) items, net of receivables from officers, directors, owners, and affiliates of the entity which are attributable to the parent. The amount of the economic entity's stockholders' equity attributable to the parent excludes the amount of stockholders' equity which is allocable to that ownership interest in subsidiary equity which is not attributable to the parent (noncontrolling interest, minority interest). This excludes temporary equity and is sometimes called permanent equity.

SummaryOfInvestmentsOtherThanInvestments.label: SEC Schedule, 12-15, Insurance Companies, Summary of Investments, Other than Investments in Related Parties, Amount
SummaryOfInvestmentsOtherThanInvestments.description: Amount of investment held by insurance company, excluding investment in related party.

SummaryOfInvestmentsOtherThanInvestments.label: SEC Schedule, 12-15, Insurance Companies, Summary of Investments, Other than Investments in Related Parties, Cost
SummaryOfInvestmentsOtherThanInvestments.description: Cost of investment held by insurance company, excluding investment in related party.

SupplementalInformationForPropertyCasual.label: Current Year Claims and Claims Adjustment Expense
SupplementalInformationForPropertyCasual.description: Amount, after effects of reinsurance, of expense for claims incurred in the current reporting period and related claims settlement costs.

SupplementaryInsuranceInformationAmortiz.label: SEC Schedule, 12-16, Insurance Companies, Supplementary Insurance Information, Amortization of Deferred Policy Acquisition Cost
SupplementaryInsuranceInformationAmortiz.description: Amount of amortization of deferred policy acquisition cost recognized, as disclosed in supplementary insurance information.

SupplementaryInsuranceInformationBenefit.label: SEC Schedule, 12-16, Insurance Companies, Supplementary Insurance Information, Benefit, Claim, Loss and Settlement Expenses
SupplementaryInsuranceInformationBenefit.description: Amount of insurance benefit, claim, loss and settlement expenses incurred, as disclosed in supplementary insurance information.

SupplementaryInsuranceInformationLiabili.label: SEC Schedule, 12-16, Insurance Companies, Supplementary Insurance Information, Liability for Future Policy Benefit, Loss, Claim and Loss Expense
SupplementaryInsuranceInformationLiabili.description: Amount of reserve for future policy claim payable and loss expense to be incurred, disclosed in supplementary insurance information.

SupplementaryInsuranceInformationNetInve.label: SEC Schedule, 12-16, Insurance Companies, Supplementary Insurance Information, Net Investment Income
SupplementaryInsuranceInformationNetInve.description: Amount of net investment income earned, disclosed in supplementary insurance information.

SupplementaryInsuranceInformationOtherOp.label: SEC Schedule, 12-16, Insurance Companies, Supplementary Insurance Information, Other Operating Expense
SupplementaryInsuranceInformationOtherOp.description: Amount of operating expense classified as other, disclosed in supplementary insurance information.

SupplementaryInsuranceInformationOtherPo.label: SEC Schedule, 12-16, Insurance Companies, Supplementary Insurance Information, Other Policy Claim and Benefit Payable
SupplementaryInsuranceInformationOtherPo.description: Amount of claim and benefit payable classified as other, disclosed in supplementary insurance information.

SupplementaryInsuranceInformationPremium.label: SEC Schedule, 12-16, Insurance Companies, Supplementary Insurance Information, Premium Revenue
SupplementaryInsuranceInformationPremium.description: Amount of premium revenue earned, disclosed in supplementary insurance information.

SupplementaryInsuranceInformationPremium.label: SEC Schedule, 12-16, Insurance Companies, Supplementary Insurance Information, Premium Written
SupplementaryInsuranceInformationPremium.description: Amount, after premiums ceded and assumed, of premium written, disclosed in supplementary insurance information.

SupplementaryInsuranceInformationUnearne.label: SEC Schedule, 12-16, Insurance Companies, Supplementary Insurance Information, Unearned Premium
SupplementaryInsuranceInformationUnearne.description: Amount of premium not yet earned, disclosed in supplementary insurance information.

TaxCreditCarryforwardAmount.label: Tax Credit Carryforward, Amount
TaxCreditCarryforwardAmount.description: The amount of the tax credit carryforward, before tax effects, available to reduce future taxable income under enacted tax laws.

TaxCreditCarryforwardValuationAllowance.label: Tax Credit Carryforward, Valuation Allowance
TaxCreditCarryforwardValuationAllowance.description: Amount of valuation allowance pertaining to the deferred tax asset representing potential future taxable deductions from tax credit carryforwards for which it is more likely than not that a tax benefit will not be realized.

TemporaryEquityAccretionToRedemptionValu.label: Temporary Equity, Accretion to Redemption Value, Adjustment
TemporaryEquityAccretionToRedemptionValu.description: Amount of decrease to net income for accretion of temporary equity to its redemption value to derive net income apportioned to common stockholders.

TradingSecurities.label: Debt Securities, Trading, and Equity Securities, FV-NI
TradingSecurities.description: Amount of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (trading) and investment in equity security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (FV-NI).

TradingSecuritiesDebt.label: Debt Securities, Trading
TradingSecuritiesDebt.description: Amount of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (trading).

TradingSecuritiesUnrealizedHoldingGainLo.label: Trading Securities, Change in Unrealized Holding Gain (Loss)
TradingSecuritiesUnrealizedHoldingGainLo.description: Amount of unrealized holding gain (loss) recognized in the income statement for investments in debt and equity securities and other forms of securities that provide ownership interests classified as trading.

TradingSecuritiesUnrealizedHoldingLoss.label: Trading Securities, Unrealized Holding Loss
TradingSecuritiesUnrealizedHoldingLoss.description: Amount of unrealized holding loss before gain recognized in the income statement for investments in trading securities.

TraditionalLifeInterestRateHighEnd.label: Traditional Life, Interest Rate, High End (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
TraditionalLifeInterestRateHighEnd.description: Maximum interest rate for traditional life contracts in the range of interest rates used to calculate future benefits to be paid to or on behalf of policyholders and related expenses less the present value of future net premiums using assumptions such as estimates of expected investment yields, mortality, morbidity, terminations and expenses, applicable at the time the insurance contracts are made and costs of settling insured claims and costs incurred in the claims settlement process of traditional life.

TraditionalLifeInterestRateLowEnd.label: Traditional Life, Interest Rate, Low End (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
TraditionalLifeInterestRateLowEnd.description: Minimum interest rate for traditional life contracts in the range of interest rates used to calculate future benefits to be paid to or on behalf of policyholders and related expenses less the present value of future net premiums using assumptions such as estimates of expected investment yields, mortality, morbidity, terminations and expenses, applicable at the time the insurance contracts are made and costs of settling insured claims and costs incurred in the claims settlement process of traditional life.

TransferOfInvestments.label: Transfer from Investments
TransferOfInvestments.description: Value of investments transferred from the entity's investments in noncash transactions.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsDecreasesResultin.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Decrease Resulting from Current Period Tax Positions
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsDecreasesResultin.description: Amount of decrease in unrecognized tax benefits resulting from tax positions that have been or will be taken in current period tax return.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsDecreasesResultin.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Decrease Resulting from Prior Period Tax Positions
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsDecreasesResultin.description: Amount of decrease in unrecognized tax benefits resulting from tax positions taken in prior period tax returns.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsDecreasesResultin.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Decrease Resulting from Settlements with Taxing Authorities
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsDecreasesResultin.description: Amount of decrease in unrecognized tax benefits resulting from settlements with taxing authorities.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncomeTaxPenaltie.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Income Tax Penalties and Interest Accrued
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncomeTaxPenaltie.description: Amount accrued for interest on an underpayment of income taxes and penalties related to a tax position claimed or expected to be claimed in the tax return.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncomeTaxPenaltie.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Income Tax Penalties and Interest Expense
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncomeTaxPenaltie.description: Amount of expense for interest on an underpayment of income taxes and penalties related to a tax position claimed or expected to be claimed in the tax return.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncreasesResultin.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Increase Resulting from Current Period Tax Positions
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncreasesResultin.description: Amount of increase in unrecognized tax benefits resulting from tax positions that have been or will be taken in current period tax return.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncreasesResultin.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Increase Resulting from Prior Period Tax Positions
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncreasesResultin.description: Amount of increase in unrecognized tax benefits resulting from tax positions taken in prior period tax returns.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsReductionsResulti.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Reduction Resulting from Lapse of Applicable Statute of Limitations
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsReductionsResulti.description: Amount of decrease in unrecognized tax benefits resulting from lapses of applicable statutes of limitations.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsThatWouldImpactEf.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits that Would Impact Effective Tax Rate
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsThatWouldImpactEf.description: The total amount of unrecognized tax benefits that, if recognized, would affect the effective tax rate.

ValueOfBusinessAcquiredVOBA.label: Present Value of Future Insurance Profits, Net
ValueOfBusinessAcquiredVOBA.description: Amount, after accumulated amortization, of present value of future profits of insurance contract acquired in business combination.

VariableInterestCarryingAmountLiabilitie.label: Variable Interest, Carrying Amount, Liabilities (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
VariableInterestCarryingAmountLiabilitie.description: Quantifies the net carrying amount of the entity's liabilities.

VariableInterestEntityConsolidatedCarryi.label: Variable Interest Entity, Consolidated, Carrying Amount, Liabilities (Deprecated 2020-01-31)
VariableInterestEntityConsolidatedCarryi.description: The carrying amount of the consolidated Variable Interest Entity's liabilities included in the reporting entity's statement of financial position.

VariableInterestEntityEntityMaximumLossE.label: Variable Interest Entity, Reporting Entity Involvement, Maximum Loss Exposure, Amount
VariableInterestEntityEntityMaximumLossE.description: The reporting entity's maximum amount of exposure to loss as a result of its involvement with the Variable Interest Entity (VIE).

WeightedAverageNumberOfDilutedSharesOuts.label: Weighted Average Number of Shares Outstanding, Diluted
WeightedAverageNumberOfDilutedSharesOuts.description: The average number of shares or units issued and outstanding that are used in calculating diluted EPS or earnings per unit (EPU), determined based on the timing of issuance of shares or units in the period.

WeightedAverageNumberOfSharesOutstanding.label: Weighted Average Number of Shares Outstanding, Basic
WeightedAverageNumberOfSharesOutstanding.description: Number of [basic] shares or units, after adjustment for contingently issuable shares or units and other shares or units not deemed outstanding, determined by relating the portion of time within a reporting period that common shares or units have been outstanding to the total time in that period.

WriteOffOfDeferredDebtIssuanceCost.label: Write off of Deferred Debt Issuance Cost
WriteOffOfDeferredDebtIssuanceCost.description: Write-off of amounts previously capitalized as debt issuance cost in an extinguishment of debt.

FairValueAssetRecurringBasisStillHeldUnr.label: Fair Value, Asset, Recurring Basis, Still Held, Unrealized Gain (Loss), OCI
FairValueAssetRecurringBasisStillHeldUnr.description: Amount of unrealized gain (loss) recognized in other comprehensive income (OCI) from asset measured at fair value on recurring basis using unobservable input (level 3) and still held.
